desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.
lore: Frost-mage Ethreain has not forgotten even the simplest of ice manipulation.
name: lich_frost_nova

affects:
ABILITY: Auto-Cast, Unit Target
AFFECTS: Allied Units
attrib:

SLOW DURATION: 2 / 2 / 2 / 2
MOVEMENT SLOW: 30% / 30% / 30% / 30%
ATTACK SLOW: 20% / 20% / 20% / 20%
cmb:
MANA COST: 50/50/50/50
COOLDOWN: 5
desc: Creates a shield around the target friendly unit or building, which adds armor and slows attacking units. Lasts 40 seconds.
notes: If autocast is activated, Lich will cast this spell on nearby allies who are attacked.
lore: Originally crafted during his ambush for self-defense, the Lich is capable of enchanting others with a formidable defense of frost magic.
name: lich_frost_armor

cmb:
MANA COST: 25/25/25/25
COOLDOWN: 44/36/28/20
desc: Sacrifices a friendly creep and converts its current hit points into mana for Lich. Grants XP to both enemies and allies.
lore: It was not unheard of Ethreain to make examples out of those who contested his rule during his human life.
name: lich_dark_ritual

cmb:
MANA COST: 200/325/500
COOLDOWN: 120/90/60
desc:
Releases an orb of frost that bounces up to 10 times, slowing and damaging enemy units. The first target is mini-stunned.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
The first target will be immediately interrupted. This stun goes through magic immunity.
Chain Frost cannot be disjointed.
lore: Almost universally considered the ultimate in frost magic, Ethreain's orb of frozen death strikes fear into those who dare stand against him.
name: lich_chain_frost
